channel.title: admin on Ben J. Ward
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Ben J. Ward

item.description: I’m a postdoctoral researcher and software developer in the Assembly & Algorithms (the A-Team) group, led by Bernardo Clavijo at the Earlham Institute in Norwich, England. The A-Team develops assembly tools and pipelines that work with different combinations of data types, including short, long and linked reads, optical maps and Hi-C data. In this multidisciplinary team of data-scientists, engineers, computer programmers and biologists, I bring my experience and perspective as an evolutionary biologist to the team.
